body:
Hay ho

So I recently bought myself a badge for 12,500 credits, I was happy as fuck and then I saw my storage was full.
Then I went on and deleted all the useless crates that are given to us and nobody ever will consider buying. 

Think about it..

Spending money to open a small crate on a server, is it seriously worth it..? It's like saying you're paying for a VPN and in that you have to pay to use it for different countries or smth. But really? Why did you even add this?

My suggestion is

1) Either remove the crates
2) Make them for free, but takes 10k credits to open one.

replies.body:
I don't see why the keys and crates should be removed.
Currently keys are the best selling item in the shop.
Also if you don't have so much credits or you aren't as dedicated to get credits, you still can get trails and perks in the hub.
Of course it would be nize if you could open them with credits, but then we would loose a steady flow of income through the shop. And in the end it comes back around to keep the server running.

PS. We are not ignoring threads like this, but sometimes we can't do anything. It's up to the developers to change it. And just because no developer or staff member posts on the thread means that it gets ignored.
